original_text: The men of Dedan were thy merchants; many isles were the merchandise of thine hand: they brought thee for a present horns of ivory and ebony.
korean_text: 드단 사람은 네 상인이 되었음이여 여러 섬이 너와 거래하여 상아와 박달나무를 네 물품과 바꾸어 갔도다

sentences.original_text: The men of Dedan were thy merchants
many isles were the merchandise of thine hand
they brought thee for a present
